db.sql: CREATE TABLE location_tracker ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, seqno NUMERIC NOT NULL, txndate TEXT NOT NULL, trackerid TEXT NOT NULL, collectorid TEXT NOT NULL, lng TEXT NOT NULL, lat TEXT NOT NULL, forupload NUMERIC NOT NULL, -- 1 or 0 timedifference NUMERIC NOT NULL, dtsaved TEXT NOT NULL, dtposted TEXT )
CREATE TABLE prev_location ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, trackerid TEXT NOT NULL, date TEXT NOT NULL, lng TEXT NOT NULL, lat TEXT NOT NULL )
